about_the_game:
*This DLC is also included in "Additional Card Pass" which is on sale. It is possible to purchase both individual "Additional Card Sets" and "Additional Card Pass", but the acquisition of included contents will only be reflected once..

Cards from Booster Pack “[D-BT07]: Raging Flames Against Emerald Storm” will be unlocked. Additional cards can be obtained by buying pack “[D-BT07]: Raging Flames Against Emerald Storm” via in-game shop or by crafting.

For more details on upcoming cards, please check the latest list for "Additional Card Set Vol.3 [D-BT07]: Raging Flames Against Emerald Storm" on the Cardfight!! Vanguard Dear Days official website.
detailed_description:
*This DLC is also included in "Additional Card Pass" which is on sale. It is possible to purchase both individual "Additional Card Sets" and "Additional Card Pass", but the acquisition of included contents will only be reflected once..

Cards from Booster Pack “[D-BT07]: Raging Flames Against Emerald Storm” will be unlocked. Additional cards can be obtained by buying pack “[D-BT07]: Raging Flames Against Emerald Storm” via in-game shop or by crafting.

For more details on upcoming cards, please check the latest list for "Additional Card Set Vol.3 [D-BT07]: Raging Flames Against Emerald Storm" on the Cardfight!! Vanguard Dear Days official website.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows8.1
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows8.1
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
